statements: SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM MarketBasketAnalysis
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, product_name, transaction_date FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE price > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE product_id = 500 AND customer_id = 200;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE transaction_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM MarketBasketAnalysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) >= 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT product_name FROM ProductNames WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT MAX(support) FROM ProductAssociations
SELECT product_id1, product_id2 FROM ProductAssociations ORDER BY confidence DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysis WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(m.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM MarketBasketAnalysis m JOIN ProductNames p ON m.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING transaction_count > 3 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;

SELECT p1.product_name AS product1, p2.product_name AS product2, support, confidence FROM ProductAssociations pa JOIN ProductNames p1 ON pa.product_id1 = p1.product_id JOIN ProductNames p2 ON pa.product_id2 = p2.product_id WHERE support > 0.5 AND confidence > 0.7 ORDER BY support DESC, confidence DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT m.transaction_id, p.product_name, m.quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysis m JOIN ProductNames p ON m.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY m.transaction_id, p.product_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT p1.product_name AS product1, p2.product_name AS product2, sum(support) AS total_support FROM ProductAssociations pa JOIN ProductNames p1 ON pa.product_id1 = p1.product_id JOIN ProductNames p2 ON pa.product_id2 = p2.product_id GROUP BY p1.product_name, p2.product_name HAVING total_support > 1 ORDER BY total_support DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysisRecords;
SELECT record_id, customer_id, product_id FROM MarketBasketAnalysisRecords WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id_1, product_id_2, support FROM ProductAssociations WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT opportunity_id, product_id, recommended_product_id, suitability_score FROM CrossSellingOpportunities WHERE suitability_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM MarketBasketAnalysisRecords WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT association_id, product_id_1, product_id_2, support, confidence FROM ProductAssociations WHERE support > 0.5;
SELECT opportunity_id, product_id, recommended_product_id, suitability_score FROM CrossSellingOpportunities ORDER BY opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM MarketBasketAnalysisRecords GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT basket_id, product_id, quantity FROM baskets ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000;
